name: Quest Vallisaari Island
summary: This visual immersion allows the navigation in three different environments: (1) a night scene on the main pond of the Island, revealing an under the water version of Helsinki; (2) inside the 19th-century fort Alexander Battery, where the user can navigate in its interior while watching fragments of the past on the walls; and (3) the external area of the fort Alexander Battery, showing a beautiful sunset and interactive walls where the user can play with sounds of nature, composing their own soundscape...
